name: Personal Portfolio Website
overview: This project is a personal portfolio website designed to highlight my skills, projects, and experience.
challenge: Creating a responsive design that works seamlessly across all devices.
details: Focus on user experience and accessibility.

name: E-commerce Platform
title: E-commerce Platform
overview: This project is a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to browse, purchase, and manage products.
challenge: Designing an intuitive user interface for product browsing and checkout.
details: Optimized checkout process for better user experience.

name: Weather App
title: Weather App
overview: This project is a weather app that provides real-time weather updates for any location.
challenge: Designing a clean and intuitive interface for displaying weather data.

name: Task Manager
title: Task Manager
overview: This project is a task management app that helps users organize and prioritize their tasks effectively.
challenge: Designing a user-friendly interface for task creation and tracking.
